cpl.readme:
This plugin adds a new tab to the tiddler info section. It's a multi column list of all tiddler tags plus all tagged tiddlers.

This plugin doesn't change any core templates.

The code below can be copied into the tag tiddlers.

```
All tiddlers tagged: {{!!title}}

<<list-links filter:"[tag{!!title}]">>
```
cpl.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/info-tagmap
cpl.author: Mario Pietsch
cpl.name: Info TagMap
cpl.description: Adds a Tag-Map tab to the tiddler info section
